elements.name: Get exchange rate for historic dates before the year 1999

steps.name: user populates RatesAPI request to get Foreign Exchange rates with date "1998-12-31"
user sends the RatesAPI request with valid url
check RatesAPI http response status code "400"
verify error description matches "There is no data for dates older then 1999-01-04."

arguments.val: "There is no data for dates older then 1999-01-04."
